Abstract: Navy's submarine force prepares to celebrate its centennial year, which begins Jan 1; special observations are planned throughout New York region; United States Postal Service will issue series of five stamps depicting 100 years of submarine history; photo (M)
Snippet: Navy's submarine force prepares to celebrate its centennial year, which begins Jan 1; special observations are planned throughout New York region; United States Postal Service will issue series of five stamps depicting 100 years of submarine histo...
LeadParagraph: After spending most of its first 100 years as the ''silent service,'' the Navy's submarine force is preparing to make a lot of noise during its centennial year, which begins today.

Headline.Main: Up Periscope! Submarine Service Is 100, and Unsilent
Headline.PrintHeadline: Up Periscope! Submarine Service Is 100, and Unsilent
